meanings.sent1: In math class, we learned about octodecillions and other big numbers.
meanings.sent2: The scientist calculated the distance in octodecillions of miles.
meanings.sent3: I have octodecillions of chores to do before the party!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as vast as octodecillions of stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with octodecillions of shiny coins.

meanings.sent1: There were octodecillions of grains of sand on the beach.
meanings.sent2: The chef needed octodecillions of sprinkles for the cake.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over octodecillions of books off the shelf!
meanings.sent4: The crowd cheered with octodecillions of voices at the concert.
meanings.sent5: The forest was home to octodecillions of colorful butterflies.
